mosinstall.name: Link - Newsfeed
mosinstall.author: Joomla! Project
mosinstall.copyright: (C) 2005 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
mosinstall.description: Creates a link to an individual Published Newsfeed

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: header
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Text to display at the top of the page

param.name: feed_image
param.label: Feed Image
param.description: Show/Hide the image of the feed

param.name: feed_descr
param.label: Feed Description
param.description: Show/Hide the description text of the feed

param.name: item_descr
param.label: Item Description
param.description: Show/Hide the description or intro text of an item

param.name: word_count
param.label: Word Count
param.description: Allows you to limit the amount of visible item description text. 0 will show all the text

param.name: robots
param.label: Robots meta tag
param.description: Select the robots META tag to apply to this page
param.option: Don't display the robot meta tag

param.name: meta_keywords
param.label: META tag keywords
param.description: META tag keywords, please seperate your keywords with a comma

param.name: meta_author
param.label: META tag author
param.description: Enter the author META tag, leave empty if you don't want it to display within the META head section
